unnormalised: Ever wonder why your Instagram reel isn't getting the same love as your neighbor Priya's? It might be time to dive into follower analytics! These insights are becoming crucial for everyone, from big brands to that uncle in Delhi trying to go viral with his chai recipes.
normalised: Ever wonder why your Instagram reel isn't getting the same love as your neighbor Priya's? It might be time to dive into follower analytics! These insights are becoming crucial for everyone, from big brands to that uncle in Delhi trying to go viral with his chai recipes.

unnormalised: Think of it as your kundali for social media success. You can see when your followers in Mumbai are most active (maybe 7 PM to 9 PM, prime binge-watching time!), what kind of content they're actually engaging with, and even their age demographics. Is your "Desi Dad Jokes" skit only resonating with the Gen Z crowd? Analytics will tell you!
normalised: Think of it as your kundali for social media success. You can see when your followers in Mumbai are most active (maybe seven P M to nine P M, prime binge-watching time!), what kind of content they're actually engaging with, and even their age demographics. Is your "Desi Dad Jokes" skit only resonating with the Gen Z crowd? Analytics will tell you!

unnormalised: Platforms like Instagram and YouTube offer built-in tools, but third-party apps can give you even deeper dives. Remember that contest you ran on Diwali, October 24th? Analytics can reveal if it actually boosted your follower count or just brought in fleeting freebie seekers.
normalised: Platforms like Instagram and YouTube offer built-in tools, but third-party apps can give you even deeper dives. Remember that contest you ran on Diwali, October twenty fourth? Analytics can reveal if it actually boosted your follower count or just brought in fleeting freebie seekers.

unnormalised: Don’t wait till January 1st to start analyzing. Your 15/08 Independence Day post could give you insights you're missing! At 09:00 hrs every morning, spend a few minutes checking your analytics. Trust us, understanding your audience is the key to becoming the next Bhuvan Bam.
normalised: Don’t wait till January first to start analyzing. Your fifteenth August Independence Day post could give you insights you're missing! At nine hundred hours every morning, spend a few minutes checking your analytics. Trust us, understanding your audience is the key to becoming the next Bhuvan Bam.
